text:
Brad Pitt is getting ready to go public with his top-secret girlfriend, Neri Oxman!

RadarOnline.com has exclusively learned Pitt, 54, and the 42-year-old MIT professor are heading to Europe together this summer.

"Neri is planning a vacation with Brad after this semester is finished," a source close to the stunning Massachusetts-based brunette said. "She has been on cloud nine!"

"The two were trying to keep their romance under wraps, but Brad is not concerned with being discreet about it anymore," added the source.
